title: FS: Group of raw T222 Fatima - ALL SOLD
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FS: Group of raw T222 Fatima - ALL SOLD
posts.post_content:
Group of 13 T222 Fatima player cards including a PSA graded Chanc. All cards have an “O.L. Felger” backstamp at the top. Several of these are really nice. Was considering sending some in for grading, but figured I’d offer them here first.

I don’t have a lot to go on for comps, so if my pricing is off, just let me know.

Price includes tracked shipping. Will consider offers, especially if buying more than 1. However anyone saying “I’ll take it” gets priority. To

Thanks for looking!

$SOLD Chance PSA 4mk
$SOLD Archer CUBS with cool catcher gear
$SOLD Barry
$SOLD Bush
$SOLD Fletcher
$SOLD McInnis
$SOLD Murphy
$SOLD Murray[STRIKE][/STRIKE]
$SOLD Oldring
$SOLD Orr
$SOLD Sallee
$SOLD Wingo
$SOLD Zimmerman CUBS
